pullRequest.title: Mention GraalVM 20.0.0 in the exception message of the version check

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                + " Quarkus currently offers a stable support of GraalVM 19.3.1 and 20.0.0."
          
          
            
                                + " Quarkus currently supports GraalVM 19.3.1 and 20.0.0."
Please keep the out of date part as that's exactly what we test. People using 20.0.1 won't have this warning for instance.

commit.message: Mention GraalVM 20.0.0 in the exception message of the version check

beforeCommit.message: Mention GraalVM 20.0.0 in the exception message of the version check

afterCommit.message: Mention GraalVM 20.0.0 in the exception message of the version check
